alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 3:15AM PST until December 02 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5 Corridor and Western Antelope Valley Foothills. * WHEN...From noon today to 3 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
